storyInfo: Taking the opportunity of the airship's crystallization, the Doctor works with W to break through the enemy blockade and find the core of the airship. But there is no Theresa here, only the revenant.

attributes.content: You said you won't resist—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You said you want the release of death—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I don't believe you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: She pierces the assassin's chest with her dagger, but intentionally avoids dealing a fatal blow.
She wants to hear the coward under the mask scream.
She slowly spins the dagger, trying to catch one sound, one sign of weakness...
She wants to hear it.
But there is nothing.
I won't let you die so easily...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You took Her Highness—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Death is too good for you...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You said you were prepared to die when you accepted the mission—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I don't believe you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You want to live, don't you? You want to run away.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: She wants them to run. She needs them to run.
That way, she can chase them, hunt them, make them die in despair.
She will drink their despair.
But that is not enough. Not even close. What would be enough?
Hold this grenade. It'll explode soon.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I'm right here. Prove it to me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You can throw it away.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Do that, and you'll live.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I won't kill you. I'll let you go.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Throw it away!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: There won't be anything left of me once this thing goes off, right?
attributes.name: Dying Assassin

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Dying Assassin

attributes.content: You should stay away.
attributes.name: Dying Assassin

attributes.content: She does not believe it. She wants to find a sign, any sign, that this man is bluffing.
One moment of hesitation, the slightest hint of his desire to live—
White light bursts before her eyes, from the hand that held the grenade tightly.
Fire flies by her cheeks, but she feels no sense of satisfaction.
This is not enough...

attributes.options: Enough, W!;There's nothing left of him but ashes!

attributes.content: No, it's not enough.
Not nearly close.
I have more—
The dark tides recede in the wake of the explosion.
What about the man? Is there no trace left of him?
Did I use too much of my stock?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Who cares, the real waste is if I don't use it.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Are you okay?
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: I... I'm okay.
What... what happened to you just now?

attributes.content: What? I was just saving your skin.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Low growling)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Little monster, you remember these people, don't you?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Ghosts that should have died a long time ago...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Angry roar)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: ...Should have died a long time ago?;Do you know these... ghosts?

attributes.content: You don't know them?
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: Should... should I?;You look so calm that you're starting to scare me.

attributes.content: Ha. You better be telling the truth.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I don't know if this is one of the revenant's tricks...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: And I don't think it's a coincidence that he appears on this ship which carries Her Highness—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But he's dead.
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: I doubt it's that simple...;I feel like there's going to be more...

attributes.content: The more the merrier.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: This mission is getting more and more interesting.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Let's go. This way?
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: Yes, this way.;No, that way.

attributes.content: You go first.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: No need to worry. This little monster goes with you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I have to keep you in my field of view in order to react in time.
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: ...;...Alright.

attributes.content: It's not that hard, is it, working with me?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The corridor smells of death. The silence is revolting.
She does not need anyone to tell her that they are getting closer to the revenant's core.
Why would Her Highness be in a place like this?
Will Her Highness be there?
Will Her Highness remember me?
She has many questions, but thinking about it serves only to stifle her excitement.
She cannot let Theresa see her down and depressed...
Theresa always told her she looks best when she is smiling. She remembers—
Hey, bastards. I was just thinking of you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You shall not pass.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: You shall not pass...
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: Go no further.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: Don't stop, {@nickname}.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What we're looking for must be waiting at the end of the corridor.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Just grab on to little monster and don't think about anything else.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I guarantee you they'll all turn to ash before they can touch you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: There's only so much you can do on your own.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: (Angry roar)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: I'm fine, Mon3tr!
Buy me some time, W! I have an idea!

attributes.content: I'm not the bunny! I don't need you to tell me what to do!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You need to do something, do it. Skip the talk.
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: ...I trust you.;Alright, I'll keep going.

attributes.content: Deal with the Doctor.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: Did you really think I was just going to leave the dumbass alone?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Have you spent so much time with the revenant that you've gone crazy too?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I left him a bunch of nice things.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Close your eyes, {@nickname}—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Bam!
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: Ouch... I knew it!;You left a 'Plan B' on me...

attributes.content: Don't praise me. I was going to give the old hag a surprise when we met up. Now it's all wasted.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Look out.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: Here's some more good stuff!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I've lit up every corner for you. Time to go to hell—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Still no use? Guess we'll have to do this the hard way.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Answers excitedly)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Just keep the Doctor alive.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: (Complaining growl)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Ghosts continue to emerge from the darkness at the end of the corridor. There seems to be no end to it.
One after another, no fear of death.
Just like back then—
Who helped you?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: She gets no answer.
This endless corridor is filled with the bodies of the perpetrators, but why could she not find out how this betrayal happened?
She is sure that the answer is here.
Here in Babel, amidst the seemingly unremarkable mission logs of PRTS.
Perhaps... it's just at the end of the corridor.
Here...
Here... beneath these bodies...
Did you come back to help...? Go save Her Highness...
attributes.name: Babel Member

attributes.content: What are you doing here...?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I tried to protect Her Highness, but someone knocked me out.
attributes.name: Babel Member

attributes.content: Did we save her?
attributes.name: Babel Member

attributes.content: You saw the assassins?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: The defense systems went offline all of a sudden. Then enemies rushed in...
attributes.name: Babel Member

attributes.content: My team and I tried to protect Her Highness—
attributes.name: Babel Member

attributes.content: Are these your teammates? They're dead.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: But you're alive.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Her Highness is dead.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Protect Her Highness. Hah.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You can 'protect Her Highness' with this grenade.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: She holds back the urge. If only she had stayed here.
Would it have changed anything?
She steps over a body and continues down the corridor.
She hears no explosion from behind her.
Trash. Coward.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: She arrives at the Speaker's Office to find the bodies of assassins piled outside the door. She does not want to go any further.
Who is she to mourn Theresa when she has not killed the traitors?
In her heart, she already has the answer to who was behind all this.
The one who led the assassins, stood here, and led death to Theresa.
She would confront that one, once she has killed everyone who participated in the deed.
It would be her last target...

attributes.options: It's time to go, W!;The door's open! We're going in!

attributes.content: ...You—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: She looks at you.
You stand in the darkness at the end of the corridor.
Mon3tr's massive frame stands between you and the ghosts charging towards you.

attributes.options: I've drawn them out!;Mon3tr can't hold them off for too long!

attributes.content: (Loud roar)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Hang in there, little monster!
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: She throws several bombs towards the gathered black apparitions.
(Angry roar)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Tsk.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: W charges into the wake of the explosion.
She goes through enemies and Mon3tr, through the fire and the cracking air.
W arrives at the other side of the door.
She turns around—
The figure is still standing in the corridor, one hand on the door control, as countless wraiths try to rush out from behind.
She has no memory of ever having seen this scene.
But there was a scene from her imagination of the assassination, a scene that she could never shake—
Did that 'evil spirit' stand before Theresa like this?
Did the culprits who took her life rush out from behind the 'evil spirit' like this?
Was it the 'evil spirit' who opened the door to the Speaker's Office?

attributes.options: Come back, Mon3tr! I'm closing the door!

attributes.content: (Excited howling)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: Another bomb, W! Buy me some time!

attributes.content: She tosses the bomb almost instinctively, without arguing.
(Raises you excitedly)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: Aw, aw, aw!;Take it easy! My back hurts!

attributes.content: She looks at you as if she is trying to find a shadow of someone bygone upon you.

attributes.options: Why are you looking at me like that?

attributes.content: Was this your genius plan to prevent them from coming in? That simple?
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: Simple? Is that so...;Sometimes the simplest means are the most effective.

attributes.content: Wait. Is this... crystallization?
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: Noticed it already, haven't you?;I saw that the airship was beginning to crystallize as I came in.

attributes.content: So that was our last chance before the door became fully crystalized...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You had planned to block the door on your own from the beginning?
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: I had you and Mon3tr.;I trust you and Mon3tr.

attributes.content: Trust... me? Hah...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Until I find out what happened back then, I—
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: Look... I think this is the place.;My calculations were right.

attributes.content: The engines roar deep inside the halls of the ship.
Souls burn, releasing pain and anger.
The core of the airship lies bare before you.

attributes.options: The airship is powered by burning the revenants?!

attributes.content: (Theresa isn't here.)
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Doesn't matter what it is. Blow it up, and this piece of junk stops.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Let's finish our business here. I got more important stuff to do.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're coming with me to see Theresa.
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: ...;Alright. I'll go with you.

attributes.content: I know you're there, old geezer.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I put a special gift for you under your bed.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: It's present time!
attributes.name: W

attributes.options: Something's not right...;The bomb didn't work?

attributes.content: The burning core instantly freezes, and the scattered flames rush back inside.
The fire that illuminates life dims.
All sound fades. One could hear one's own heartbeat in the silence left behind.
Darkness begins to fill the room.
Shadows flow out of the core, converging into a great river, its current speeding up...
Until a great black tide, enough to swallow the entire room, rushes towards you.
Such great pain and anger...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No more words for you, outblood King!
attributes.name: Shadow

attributes.content: I have abided your many transgressions only because of Theresa. No more!
attributes.name: Shadow

attributes.content: Do you know what you are trying to stop?
attributes.name: Shadow

attributes.content: It is not just a war that the Sarkaz needs!
attributes.name: Shadow

attributes.content: You are trying to extinguish the flame that will change our destiny!
attributes.name: Shadow

attributes.content: You shall not succeed—
attributes.name: Shadow

attributes.content: The black tide that swallowed Amiya recedes, and the shadows pulling at her weaken.
He's focusing his strength?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All the shadows... they've disappeared.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Looks like someone else found the revenant's location first.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Is the Doctor okay? I wonder where Dr. Kal'tsit and W are...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can feel the place where the anger is strongest. That's what we're looking for.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hang in there, Doctor, Dr. Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm coming!
attributes.name: Amiya
Amiya
attributes.content: Signs of explosions...

attributes.name: Amiya
attributes.content: W must have been here!
Did Mon3tr leave these claw marks? Is the Doctor with W?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: A figure that Amiya never expected to see emerges from the shadow at the end of the corridor.
She has never forgotten the nightmare from so many years ago.
She remembers Theresa, and the black sword that pierced her chest...
The black-robed killers.
Impossible...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You... you're all dead.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ascalon checked and made sure you...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...King of Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: You're too late. She knew you would come.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: Theresa...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, the ones you're looking for will die.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: Get out of my way.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Spare the effort of reading our emotions.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: The only way you will pass...
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: ...is over our cold, dead bodies.
attributes.name: Airship 'Apparition'

attributes.content: I see the fragments of your memories—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: How could this be...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You're from Babel?!
attributes.name: Amiya
